plot: Six college friends in their thirties are brought back to Los Angeles to plan a funeral of a mutual friend. Which leads to re-surfacing of old feelings and unfinished business.
title: Flip the Script
plot_es: Six college friends in their thirties are brought back to Los Angeles to plan a funeral of a mutual friend. Which leads to re-surfacing of old feelings and unfinished business.
